mapper.select: SELECT a.task_status applyTaskStatus, COALESCE(a.apply_result, 999999) applyResult, COALESCE(a.push_result, 999999) pushResult, COALESCE(b.task_status, 999999) queryTaskStatus, COALESCE(b.query_result, 999999) queryResult, COALESCE(c.task_status, 999999) mprTaskStatus, COALESCE(c.mpr_result, 999999) mprResult FROM tb_keya_apply_task a LEFT JOIN tb_keya_query_task b ON a.compute_series_id = b.compute_series_id LEFT JOIN tb_mpr_task c ON a.compute_series_id = c.compute_series_id WHERE a.compute_series_id = #{computeSeriesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
